Your Partner in Health

Expert Guidance, Compassionate Care

Meet the expert dedicated to empowering you on your path to lasting health through a nutritional approach that is scientific, deeply personalized, and always supportive.

Pierre Abou-Zeid

Certified Dietitian-Nutritionist (INAMI & MONASH University)

A Passion for Science, A Heart for People

My journey into nutrition is driven by a passion for science and a deep desire to provide solutions that genuinely improve lives. My own experience with type 2 diabetes gives me a profound, personal understanding of the challenges and triumphs of managing a health condition. It’s not just about data for me; it’s about empowering you with empathy and knowledge that comes from firsthand experience.

My background combines a Bachelor's in Dietetics from Erasmus University College with an earlier degree as a Computer Programmer and Analyst. This unique perspective allows me to apply scientific rigor and analytical thinking to solve your nutritional challenges, leveraging technology to enhance your care and make your journey smoother.

"My goal is to demystify nutrition and give you the confidence to become the expert of your own health. It’s a partnership built on trust and shared success."

Our Commitment to You

You Are Seen and Heard

Your journey starts with us listening. We combine cutting-edge nutrition science with your unique story to create a plan that’s built for you.

An End to Diet Frustration

Forget the guilt of past diets. Our approach focuses on satisfying, nourishing foods that feel empowering, not punishing.

Guidance You Can Trust

We provide the most effective, evidence-based strategies, ensuring your plan is both safe and powerful.

Confidence for Life

We don't just give you a plan—we teach you how your body works, empowering you to make confident choices for the long term.

Areas of Expertise

We provide specialized, evidence-based guidance to help you navigate your health challenges and achieve your goals. Below are our core areas of focus.

Sustainable Weight Loss

We help you move beyond the frustration of yo-yo dieting. Our approach focuses on building healthy, sustainable habits that fit your life, so you can lose weight and keep it off—without sacrificing the foods you love. We empower you with the science of metabolism and satiety to achieve lasting results.

Type 2 Diabetes Management

Managing diabetes can feel overwhelming, but you don't have to do it alone. We provide clear, practical guidance to help you stabilize your blood sugar, improve your energy levels, and reduce the risk of complications. Our goal is to give you the confidence and knowledge to manage your health effectively.

Heart Health & Cholesterol

Your heart health is too important for generic advice. We create personalized eating plans based on the latest cardiovascular research to help you manage cholesterol and blood pressure. Our focus is on delicious, heart-healthy foods that protect your long-term well-being.

IBS & Digestive Wellness

Find lasting relief from digestive discomfort. As a MONASH University certified expert in the Low FODMAP diet, we guide you through this evidence-based process to identify your specific trigger foods and expand your diet with confidence. Our goal is to help you achieve "food freedom" and enjoy eating again.

Nutrigenomics

Unlock the secrets of your unique genetic profile. We use cutting-edge Nutrigenomix® testing to understand how your body responds to different nutrients. This allows us to provide hyper-personalized recommendations that are tailored to your DNA, optimizing your path to peak health and performance.

Ready to Start Your Health Transformation?

Your journey to better health begins with a simple conversation. Let's work together to create a nutrition plan that fits your life and helps you achieve the results you deserve.
